subject: feat: create CV PWA with React, Vite, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
body:
Set up a complete Progressive Web App for displaying a personal CV/resume:
- React + TypeScript + Vite scaffold with Tailwind CSS v4 dark theme
- PWA support via vite-plugin-pwa (service worker, manifest, offline caching)
- 7 CV sections: Hero, About, Experience, Education, Skills, Projects, Contact
- Centralized CV data in src/data/cv-data.ts for easy content updates
- GitHub Actions workflow for automated deployment to GitHub Pages
- Print-friendly styles with white background override
- Responsive design with mobile-first approach

https://claude.ai/code/session_01PMUu183L6Vd9RRJskrTWhL
title: create CV PWA with React, Vite, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
